alert.note: Alert for Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 07 at 6:53AM PST until November 09 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 7000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Sheep Range and Spring Mountains. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times on upper sections of Lee Canyon and Kyle Canyon roads. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon
